abstract: The bill would prohibit using federal funds made available through the new health care law to buy health insurance policies that offer abortions.
snippet: The bill would prohibit using federal funds made available through the new health care law to buy health insurance policies that offer abortions.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)

lead_paragraph: 8:22 p.m. | Updated House Republicans have had a laserlike focus on dismantling various forms of federal regulations this month, the centerpiece of their job creation agenda.

headline.main: House Passes Another Bill to Reduce Access to Abortions
